krikat loka kusalana tharagawaliye tharaga athulu me dinawaladi pawathwena perahuru tharaga sandaha polisiya yuda hamudawe da sahaya athiwa dawantha aarakshaka wadapiliwelak diyath kara thibe.aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathage upades matha polispathi mahinda balasuriya mahathage adhikshanaya yatathe polisiye jyeshta niyojya polispathiwaru , niyojya polispathiwaru, polis adhikariwaru athulu polisiye wishala pirisak me aarakshaka wadapiliwelata sahaya wethi.eeye (15) sita me aarakshaka wadapiliwela aarambha wini.labana marthu 29 wanida dakwa eya kriyathmaka weyi.
